sentence.idiomatic: Today the sun is really hot. Before you go out you must apply sunscreen from head to foot.
How come you're soaked from head to foot? Didn't you bring an umbrella when you left the house this morning?
She is a man-made beauty--she has had cosmetic surgery done from head to toe.
Every day at dawn, grandmother carries her basket to the local market to buy vegetables.
When he came back, he was carrying a big bag in his hand. I wonder what is packed inside of it.
Every time it's Spring Festival, the train station is always overflowing with people carrying bags large and small, rushing home to celebrate the new year.
No wonder my ears are hot--it was because you were talking bad about me.
It is Sunday today, after all. No wonder the buses are all so empty.
How come you cut your hair? No wonder I didn't recognize you at first glance.
On May Day I want to go on a shopping spree in Hong Kong, what about you?
As soon as she gets her paycheck she goes on an insane shopping spree.
Finding a brand that's design, quality of material and price suit you is a fundamental factor in avoiding blindly over-spending.
I really didn't realize she was so easy.
Don't mistakenly think that all art students are promiscuous.
He may look like a player, but actually, in his heart of hearts, he is very decent.
I don't like pretty boys--I like the rugged type.
Young male gold-diggers often give people the feeling that they're living off a woman.
Some male gold-diggers rely on their good looks to cheat women of their money. It's really a disgrace to men everywhere.
At the moment, there is a huge demand for biotechnology talent in our country.
If there is a market demand, we need to satisfy the demand. If there is no market demand, we then need to create the demand.
I think there is no way the design of this product will satisfy the requirements of domestic users.
The autopsy scene in the movie was really so horrifying.
I heard that recently a very terrifying shooting incident took place here.
Yesterday evening I saw a person's shadow quietly following me, it was really so scary. It almost scared me to death.
I saw Yiyi yesterday. Her boyfriend is quite elderly, isn't he?
Which one are you talking about? She has so many boyfriends, one of every age. Where did you see her?
In a shop. She was wearing brand-name clothing from head to toe. Her hands were full of bags.
Oh, no wonder she was with an old guy--it's because she went on a shopping spree.
It's seems like she's pretty easy. A few days ago at the bar I also saw her with a young, good-looking guy.
That's so like her. She changes her men by the day. Basically, what ever whim she has, she'll go after that kind of guy.
That kind of woman is really scary. How long have you know her?
I knew her back in university. She was like that then -- today she was chasing a student, the next day a boss.
Wow, does she work?
She doesn't need to. Anyway, she has people to pay her way.

word.literal: to be with a rich man
to live off of a woman
